      • getDateFilterRules

        public java.util.Map<ReportColumn,FilterRule> getDateFilterRules()
        the date-columns filter rules. They lie separate here instead of being merged into ReportFiltersImpl.getFilterRules() because this is the way they have been implemented in the old Mondrian/API/frontend TODO: make this field disappear when reimplementing (?) the filter widget backend API
        Returns:

      • addDateRangeFilterRule

        public void addDateRangeFilterRule(java.util.Date from,
                                   java.util.Date to)
                            throws AmpApiException
        Adds a date range filter [from .. to] or [from .. infinite ) or (infinite .. to]
        Parameters:
        from - - the date to start from or null
        to - - the date to end with or null
        Throws:
        AmpApiException - if range is invalid

      • addQuarterFilterRule

                          throws AmpApiException
        Adds a quarter list filter
        Parameters:
        quarters - - the quarters to include
        Throws:
        AmpApiException - if quarter is invalid

      • addQuarterFilterRule

        public void addQuarterFilterRule(java.lang.Integer start,
                                 java.lang.Integer end)
                          throws AmpApiException
        Adds a quarter range filter [from .. to] or [from .. infinite ) or (infinite .. to]
        Parameters:
        start - - first quarter to include
        end - - last quarter to include
        Throws:
        AmpApiException - if range is invalid

      • addDateRangeFilterRule

        public void addDateRangeFilterRule(ReportColumn column,
                                   java.util.Date from,
                                   java.util.Date to)
                            throws AmpApiException
        Adds a date range filter [from .. to] or [from .. infinite ) or (infinite .. to], over the specified report column
        Parameters:
        column - - the column to filter by (may not be present in the report)
        from - - the date to start from or null
        to - - the date to end with or null
        Throws:
        AmpApiException - if range is invalid

      • addYearsRangeFilterRule

        public void addYearsRangeFilterRule(java.lang.Integer from,
                                    java.lang.Integer to)
                             throws AmpApiException
        Adds a measures filter between [from .. to] or [from .. infinite) or (-infinite .. to] year ranges.
        Parameters:
        from - - the year to start from or null
        to - - the year to end with or null
        Throws:
        AmpApiException

      • addYearsRangeFilterRuleNoConv

        public void addYearsRangeFilterRuleNoConv(java.lang.Integer from,
                                          java.lang.Integer to)
                                   throws AmpApiException
        Same as addYearsRangeFilterRule except it does not convert years from one calendar to another since the filter is already specified in target calendar.
        Parameters:
        from - - the year to start from or null
        to - - the year to end with or null
        Throws:
        AmpApiException
